person.persName: John J. Dyer, Jr. (Trigg County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff.)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, farmer and sheriff. Kentucky native. Son of John J. Dyer, Sr., and Martha Linn Dyer. Married to Mariah Haydon Dyer in Trigg County, Kentucky, on October 20, 1842. Father of William C. Dyer, Eliza H. Dyer, Rufus K. Dyer, Cyrus Dyer, Amanda Dyer, Lucy Dyer, Julia Dyer, Sidney Dyer, and Mariah Dyer. Farmer in Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1850. Sheriff of Trigg County from 1859 to 1862. Owned five enslaved persons in Trigg County in 1860.
